title: Beef goulash
directions: Fry diced onions in a pan. After a while add paprika.
Dice washed meat to roughly equal sized pieces, add to the pan and brown it.
Add a bit of water to braise the meat. Wait until all the water is gone and then add a bit more.
When the meat is half-done, add more water, flour, salt, black pepper and braise until the beef is tender. Braise for about 1 hours in total.
